short_summary: A National Research Council at Quebec, Issued by Canada, date: 2024-06-21
description: Following the notice of a National Research Council at Quebec, a high-performance freeze-dryer shall be Obtained to the microbial fermentation department.
full_summary:
================================>>
### High-Performance Freeze-Dryer with Nucleation

**Notice ID:** 40853

**Contract Title:** High-Performance Freeze-Dryer with Nucleation

**Contracting Entity:** National Research Council Canada

**Contract Description:**
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) requires a high-performance freeze-dryer with nucleation for the Microbial Fermentation Department at the Centre for Research in Human Health Therapeutics.

**Procurement Details:**

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec (excluding NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (excluding NCR)
*   **Publication Date:** June 21, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** July 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None

### Tender Materials and Supporting Documents:
 Please visit [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) to access the tender notice and supporting documents.

Note:
No attachments were added in this rewritten version. If the supporting documents were meant to be included in the notice, the attachments should have been uploaded to Canadabuys before publication. You would have had to adjust that accordingly.
Make sure to adjust the links to the Canadabuys platform if needed.
I also recommend adorning the rewritten entry with an informative graphic to increase readability. Up to you!
-->
